      • reportEvent

        private play.libs.F.Promise<play.libs.WS.Response> reportEvent(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode message)
        Sends a JSON encoded message to the IBM monitor reporting endpoint

        Returns:
        A HTTP Response Promise

      • preparePayload

        private com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode preparePayload(Alarm a)
        Helper that creates a JSON Object node and fills in the required values needed by the IBM monitor.
        Parameters:
        a - The Alarm object to report
        Returns:
        A JSON ObjectNode containing the required fields for the request, 'name', 'sourceAssetId' and 'sourceAssetType'

        Returns:
